sense.gloss: making (a report, plan, contract, etc.), drawing up, writing out, preparing, creating (a file, website, account, etc.)
growth, development, growing up, becoming an adult
growth (of a company, the economy, etc.)
composition, construction, formation, makeup, structure, organization, organisation
(good) result, outcome, fruits (of one's labors), product, accomplishment
formation, molding, making (up), taking form, giving form to
formation, establishment, materialization, coming into existence
conclusion (e.g. of a deal), reaching (e.g. an agreement), approval, completion, closing, enacting, arrangement
being valid (of a theory, argument, etc.), holding, applying

sdata.j: もっと↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑気↑↓き↓にかけられればいいのだけれど、でも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓のある↑点↑↓てん↓において↑成績↑↓せいせき↓はそんなに↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓ではないと↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ。
sdata.e: I wish I could care more about my grades but it seems that, at a certain point of my life, I decided they wouldn't be so important anymore.
Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: ローマは↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓にして↑成↑↓な↓らず。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: あなたは↑妊娠↑↓にんしん↓↑中絶↑↓ちゅうぜつ↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against abortions?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑評論↑↓ひょうろん↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓の↑表面↑↓ひょうめん↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑分析↑↓ぶんせき↓↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げていただけだったのでクラスで↑最↑↓さい↓↑上位↑↓じょうい↓の↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑得↑↓え↓たことにとても↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いた。
sdata.e: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のウェブサイトの↑構成↑↓こうせい↓を↑変↑↓か↓えた。
↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑後半↑↓こうはん↓というのは、ただ↑前半↑↓ぜんはん↓に↑会得↑↓えとく↓した↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だけで↑成↑↓な↓り↑立↑↓た↓っているのさ。
sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓には↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓できません。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えに↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですかそれとも↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓か↑反対↑↓はんたい↓か。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

words.gloss: making (a report, plan, contract, etc.), drawing up, writing out, preparing, creating (a file, website, account, etc.)
